questionTitle: Which of the following is the first level applicable attribute?
questionExplanation: Availability defines the proportion of time that the system is functional and working.

questionTitle: Pods are aggregated into pools within an IaaS region or site called an _________ zone.
questionExplanation: In very large cloud computing networks, when systems fail, they fail on a pod-by-pod basis, and often on a zone-by-zone basis.

questionTitle: _______ is Microsoft’s cloud-based management service for Windows systems.
questionExplanation: The management services include an Operations Manager, the Windows Service Update Service (WSUS), a Configuration Manager for asset management, a Data Protection Manager, and a Virtual Machine Manager, among other components.

questionTitle: ________ offers various Linux distributions upon which you can build a virtual machine.
questionExplanation: Jcinacio has Ubuntu appliances.

questionTitle: Which of the following combination is possible in WebSphere ESB?
questionExplanation: An ESB may require a variety of combinations in order to support communications between a service consumer and a service provider.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Amazon Elastic Cloud is a system for creating virtual disks(volume)
questionOption2: SimpleDB interoperates with both Amazon EC2 and Amazon S3
questionOption3: EC3 is an Analytics as a Service provider
questionExplanation: Amazon SimpleDB stores data in “buckets” and without requiring the creation of a database schema.

questionTitle: Rackspace Cloud Service is an example of _____________
questionExplanation: Unlike other cloud providers, Rackspace only offers managed solutions.

questionTitle: Which of the following is property of ACID principle?
questionExplanation: The ACID principle is used today by any application that is reading and writing to a stored data set.

questionTitle: Applications such as a Web server or database server that can run on a virtual machine image are referred to as ______________
questionExplanation: The name virtual appliance is a little misleading because it conjures up the image of a machine that serves a narrow purpose.

questionTitle: The technology used to distribute service requests to resources is referred to as _____________
questionExplanation: Load balancing is an optimization technique.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: In practice, there is less performance variability in cloud machine instances
questionOption2: Capacity planning seeks to compare the capability of one system against another system
questionOption3: Capacity planning provides the service with the best operational parameters at the lowest cost
questionExplanation: This variability may be due to your machine instances or storage buckets being moved from one system to another system.

questionTitle: Which of the following metadata MIME is required in a PUT operation?
questionExplanation: A variety of KEY/VALUE pairs describing object attributes in CDMI is defined by the standard.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a push mechanism for publishing Web site data that is device-specific?
questionExplanation: WAP stands for Wireless Access Protocol.

questionTitle: Which of the following correctly describes the following figure?
questionExplanation: Capacity planning measures the maximum amount of work that can be done using the current technology and then adds resources to do more work as needed.

questionTitle: How many different protocol types are required for message passing in SOA?
questionExplanation: Message passing in SOA requires the use of two different protocol types: the data interchange format and the network protocol that carries the message.

questionTitle: Which of the attributes is required for the best user interface?
questionExplanation: An attribute map is created to expose critical functionality.

questionTitle: Windows Server AppFabric enables Web data caching for application data and provides managed services using ___________Foundation and Windows Communication.
questionExplanation: Azure AppFabric Access Control enables secure application requests through a token mechanism.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: Cloud management includes not only managing resources in the cloud but managing resources on-premises
questionOption2: The management of resources in the cloud requires new technology
questionOption3: Management of resources on-premises allows vendors to use well-established network management technologies
questionExplanation: The lifecycle of a cloud application includes six defined parts, and each must be managed.

questionTitle: Point out the correct statement.
questionOption1: MobileMe Mail adds a number of features to hosted e-mail including better screen control and formatting, picture handling, and a rich Web experience
questionOption2: MobileMe Calendar is an updated version of the online calendar application
questionOption3: iPhone applications are hosted on the iTunes App Store
questionExplanation: Many applications are heavy users of Internet or Web services and require dedicated infrastructure to stage.

questionTitle: Which of the following service model is owned in terms of infrastructure by both vendor and customer?
questionExplanation: Infrastructure location is both on- and off-premises.

questionTitle: Which of the following creates a custom search utility for a particular Web site?
questionExplanation: Custom Search lets you programmatically build and manage custom search engines for your site.

questionTitle: Which of the following feature is supported by Skype application?
questionExplanation: Skype is perhaps the most widely used telephony application in the world.

questionTitle: Which of the following social networking site is used for Business and professional networking?
questionExplanation: Mixi is a Japanese social network.

questionTitle: The connection between storage and Microsoft’s Content Delivery Network is stated to be at least _______ percent uptime.
questionExplanation: In the Windows Azure Service Level Agreement, Microsoft states that it guarantees external connectivity between two or more role instances that are located in different Azure domains of at least 99.95 percent uptime.

questionTitle: Which of the following backup systems are expensive and highly customized to a particular application such as SQL Server?
questionExplanation: Some applications such as database systems and messaging systems are mission critical and cannot be shut down before being backed up.

questionTitle: Which of the following backup is used by Apple’s Time Machine?
questionExplanation: Software that uses reverse delta backup system is Apple’s Time Machine and the RDIFF-BACKUP utility.

questionTitle: Which of the following tool captures time-dependent performance data from resources such as a CPU load?
questionExplanation: RRDTool stands for the Round Robin Database tool.

questionTitle: How many types of protocols are important for instant messaging?
questionExplanation: In an effort to create an interoperability standard between different IM clients, several instant messaging protocols have been created.

questionTitle: Point out the wrong statement.
questionOption1: Everything from the application down to the infrastructure is the vendor’s responsibility
questionOption2: In the deployment model, different cloud types are an expression of the manner in which infrastructure is deployed
questionOption3: AaaS provides virtual machines, operating systems, applications, services, development frameworks, transactions, and control structures
questionExplanation: PaaS provides virtual machines, operating systems, applications, services, development frameworks, transactions, and control structures.

questionTitle: Amazon Web Services supports ________ Type II Audits.
questionExplanation: Becoming a cloud service provider requires a large investment.
